delegate bool Tibia.KeyboardHook.HookHandler ( Keys  key  ) 

Delegate for handling a key down event.

Parameters:
key The key that was pressed. Check Control, Shift, Alt, and Win for modifiers.
Returns:
True if you want the key to pass through (be recognized for the app), False if you want it to be trapped (app never sees it).

static bool Tibia.KeyboardHook.Enable (  )  [static]

Start the keyboard hook.

Returns:
True if no exceptions.

static bool Tibia.KeyboardHook.Disable (  )  [static]

Disable keyboard hooking.

Returns:
True if disabled correctly.
